events.message: I just received my order, but the item has several scratches and looks damaged. I am very disappointed with the state it arrived in.
The case has been categorized under Product Defect due to the reported scratches and damage on the delivered item.
The case was assigned to a product support agent to handle the defect report for further assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the scratches on your product. I’m here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and any other damage so we can assess the situation and suggest the best solution?
I have attached several clear photos showing the scratches on multiple sides of the product. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you either a replacement product or a full refund. Please let us know which option works best for you.
I would prefer to receive a replacement as I still want the product but it needs to be in perfect condition. Thanks for your help.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours with priority delivery. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
We wanted to check in to ensure that your replacement product arrived in perfect condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and it looks brand new. Thank you for the prompt resolution and good service.
Thank you for confirming the replacement’s condition. We are closing this case now but please reach out if you need further assistance.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on how we handled your product defect case.
